markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" /><actions string="Single Action" /> envision; or <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, envision ([teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. If you used 2 actions, you can teleport up to 60 feet.
name: envision (one action); or command, envision (two actions) (teleportation)
